## interface_BootstrapWidgetsConfig

Configuration interface for various Bootstrap widgets.

### Properties

#### accordion

> **accordion**: [`AccordionProps`](./components/accordion#accordionprops)


the accordion widget config

***

#### alert

> **alert**: [`AlertProps`](./components/alert#alertprops)


the alert widget config

***

> **carousel**: [`CarouselProps`](./components/carousel#carouselprops)\<`any`\>
